General.Name: Stx Heavy Indu
General.Description: STX Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells marine engines, industrial facilities, and plants in South Korea and internationally. It also engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of wind equipment, as well as provides shipbuilding equipment. The company was formerly known as STX Metal Co., Ltd. and changed its name to STX Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. in January 2013. STX Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Changwon, South Korea.
